name: restConnector
description: APS Connector that provides an HTTP client for consuming any REST service

0d06f1c3-ede6-498a-9ca6-e0ac0f1c9213.name: GET
0d06f1c3-ede6-498a-9ca6-e0ac0f1c9213.description: Invokes the HTTP GET method to get data from a specific resource.

inputs.name: restUrl
inputs.description: URL of the REST endpoint including protocol, host and path.

inputs.name: restUrlParams
inputs.description: URL params to append to the url.

inputs.name: requestHeaders
inputs.description: Map of request header names and values. Values can be fixed values, variables or form fields.

inputs.name: circuitBreaker
inputs.description: If this variable is present and true with any value, the circuit breaker is enabled.

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.description: Integer with the timeout call in milliseconds.

inputs.name: restUrlEncoded
inputs.description: Indicates whether the final URL should be encoded or not

outputs.name: restResult
outputs.description: The response from the REST service call

outputs.name: restError
outputs.description: Error description when an error occurs calling the REST service

9718c25a-0f3c-4ad2-85d4-148111ca4d4a.name: POST
9718c25a-0f3c-4ad2-85d4-148111ca4d4a.description: Invokes the HTTP POST method to send data to a server to create/update a resource.

inputs.name: restUrl
inputs.description: URL of the REST endpoint including protocol, host and path.

inputs.name: restUrlParams
inputs.description: URL params to append to the url.

inputs.name: requestPayload
inputs.description: Map of JSON properties and values to compose the request payload. Values can be fixed values, variables or form fields.

inputs.name: requestHeaders
inputs.description: Map of request header names and values. Values can be fixed values, variables or form fields.

inputs.name: circuitBreaker
inputs.description: If this variable is present with any value, the circuit breaker is enabled.

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.description: Integer with the timeout call in milliseconds.

inputs.name: restUrlEncoded
inputs.description: Indicates whether the final URL should be encoded or not

outputs.name: restResult
outputs.description: The response from the REST service call

outputs.name: restError
outputs.description: Error description when an error occurs calling the REST service
